text: anyone familiar with DSLRs? which would you recommend for doing videos? I am looking for something in the price range of £300 - £700 (body and lens)
a lot comes down to glass and you get some great glass for little $$$ if you go with prime lenses instead of zoom
but for video that might be hard to live with, depends on the type of video
It will be for wedding videos and video blogging type videos
